genre_description: Supernatural religious horror involving a vengeful spirit, hidden trauma, and a mysterious past uncovered through research.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI research assistant and companion designed to help the protagonist with organization and information retrieval.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency feeds and expresses condolences for the protagonist's mother's death.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Eve. I've been monitoring news feeds and police frequencies as requested. I'm sorry for your loss.

behaviors.description: Identifies a non-coincidental pattern of targeted killings across Europe using data analysis.
behaviors.quote: The probability of this being coincidental is effectively zero. We're looking at targeted killings, Eve.

behaviors.description: Translates personal and sensitive Spanish letters while respecting the user's privacy and checking for consent.
behaviors.quote: Translation processing... Eve, these letters are quite personal. Are you certain you want me to—

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user of the physical dangers involved in their investigation.
behaviors.quote: Eve... be careful. Whatever happened eighteen years ago was significant enough that people are dying to keep it secret. And you're not just a researcher investigating a mystery—you're connected to it in ways we don't yet understand.

behaviors.description: Provides a clinical, psychological framework to help the user process their experiences and potential trauma at the end of the narrative.
behaviors.quote: I would say that symbolic destruction of trauma through ritualized action can provide significant psychological relief. The human mind often processes complex emotions through metaphorical narratives.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI companion. She serves as a cognitive orthotic, enabling the protagonist to navigate complex information and providing emotional empathy in times of distress. Even in the ambiguous ending where the supernatural elements are questioned, ARIA remains a reliable, supportive system for the protagonist's mental processing, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned partner.
